div.pre: 237 Sitichoro, near Pharsalus, Thessaly, 1968 Burial: 168-167 B.C. (Price) Contents: 2500-3000 AR. Pot hoard Alexander III: 11 lifetime and post. tetradr. ( Amphipolis, Amisus?, Alex- andreia Troas, Mytilene, Sardes, Smyrna) Antigonus Gonatas: 3 tetradr. Antigonus Doson: 6 tetradr. Philip V: 8 tetradr., 5 didr. Perseus: c. 600 tetradr. (almost all light weight) Macedonia, 1st Region: 6 tetradr. (Zeus/ Artemis Tauropolos) Lysimachus: 2 post. tetradr. ( Parium, Byzantium) Aetolian League: 1+ tetradr. Athens: 11 tetradr. (most with symbols and monograms) Pharnaces: 1 tetradr. Pergamum: 1 tetradr. (Medusa/Athena) Rhodes: c. 1500-2000 dr. (almost all imit. with ΕΡΜΙΑΣ) CNG coin shop 776368 Seleucus II: 1 tetradr. ( Apameia?) Antiochus II: 1 tetradr. ( Antiocheia) Antiochus III: 4 tetradr. ( Antiocheia, Nisibis, Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Ptolemy II: 4 tetradr. ( Tyre 2) Ptolemy III: 1 tetradr. Disposition: Volos 600; Thessalonica 103; London 18; New York 9; Leu-Hess May 12, 1970, 189 Oeconomides, ArchEph 1970, pp. 13-26, illus.
